channel.title: Halloween event!
channel.description:
i want to know how to make a Halloween event. if some 1 has one already made thats better. i basically want there to be a zombie or something that tells u to kill something on server to get a key and use it on a chest to get a Halloween item. or something else i dont really care i just want an event......any help would be great thanks.
owner of b15.servebeer.com :)
